title: The healing of Israels breaches. VVherein is set forth Israels disease. Cure. Physitian. Danger. All paralleld with, and applyed to the present times. As they were delivered in six sermons at the weekly lecture in the church of Great Yarmouth. By John Brinsly minister of the Word, and pastor of Somerleiton an adjacent village. Published by order of a committee of the House of Commons.
author: Brinsley, John, 1600-1665.
publisher: Printed for John Bartlet, at the signe of the golden Cup, neere S. Austins gate, in S. Pauls Church-yard,
notes: The words "disease. .. Danger." are enclosed in brackets on title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
